text: Tibusungu 'e Vayayana () is a Taiwanese Tsou politician. He has served as the Deputy Minister of the Council of Indigenous Peoples since 20 May 2016. Tibusungu 'e Vayayana obtained his bachelor's, master's and doctoral degrees in geography from National Taiwan Normal University. ==References== Category:Living people Category:Political office-holders in the Republic of China on Taiwan Category:National Taiwan Normal University alumni Category:Tsou people Category:Year of birth missing (living people)
title: Tibusungu 'e Vayayana
